data.message: I would love to win this for my sister who is Ed's biggest fan! We have repeatedly failed to get tickets for any of his concerts, it's impossible. My sister is currently waiting for a op on her head as she has fluid on the brain which causes her major pain on most days and has to have lumbar puncture done every 2 weeks to drain the fluid. Winning this would be so awarding for her and something to look forward to and forget about her pain for a little while. Thank you coca-cola.
